mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assistcollection ( paper_id, user_id) SELECT paper_id,user_id FROM test_paper ,user WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT test_paper. paper_id,user.id FROM test_paper,user,assistcollection WHERE test_paper.paper_id = assistcollection.paper_id AND user.id = assistcollection.user_id )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT test_paper.paper_name,test_paper.paper_id,peixun_kaoshi.`user`.username, (SELECT COUNT( type ) FROM all_questions,test_paper,user_questions WHERE type = 1 AND all_questions.questions_id = user_questions.questions_id AND test_paper.paper_id = user_questions.paper_id AND test_paper.paper_id =#{paperId}) AS danxuan, (SELECT COUNT( type ) FROM all_questions,test_paper,user_questions WHERE type = 2 AND all_questions.questions_id = user_questions.questions_id AND test_paper.paper_id = user_questions.paper_id AND test_paper.paper_id =#{paperId}) AS duoxuan, (SELECT COUNT( type ) FROM all_questions,test_paper,user_questions WHERE type = 3 AND all_questions.questions_id = user_questions.questions_id AND test_paper.paper_id = user_questions.paper_id AND test_paper.paper_id =#{paperId}) AS panduan, (SELECT COUNT( type ) FROM all_questions,test_paper,user_questions WHERE type = 4 AND all_questions.questions_id = user_questions.questions_id AND test_paper.paper_id = user_questions.paper_id AND test_paper.paper_id =#{paperId}) AS tiankong, (SELECT COUNT( type ) FROM all_questions,test_paper, user_questions WHERE type = 5 AND all_questions.questions_id = user_questions.questions_id AND test_paper.paper_id = user_questions.paper_id AND test_paper.paper_id =#{paperId}) AS jianda FROM test_paper LEFT JOIN user_questions ON user_questions.paper_id = test_paper.paper_id LEFT JOIN all_questions ON all_questions.questions_id = user_questions.questions_id LEFT JOIN peixun_kaoshi.`user` ON peixun_kaoshi.`user`.id = user_questions.user_id WHERE test_paper.paper_id =#{paperId}
